product_name: Moving Comfort 4" Compression Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for wearing under a sport dress, the Moving Comfort 4" Compression Shorts are long on flattery, with a wide, non-elastic waistband and chafe-free, flatseam construction. Polyester/spandex fabric compresses for muscle support and wicks moisture for workout comfort. Generous 2-1/4 in. wide waistband lies flat against waist. Double-layer crotch gusset takes the place of your underwear. Moving Comfort 4" Compression Shorts feature a small internal pocket for your house key. Closeout.
short_description: Great for wearing under a sport dress, the Moving Comfort 4" Compression Shorts are long on flattery, with a wide, non-elastic waistband and chafe-free, flatseam construction.
